Would it be difficult to change the default format to the System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat.ShortDateFormat ?

Either way, I'll fix my code. Thanks for replying and thanks for a great library.

>Would it be difficult to change the default format to the System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat.ShortDateFormat ?
I've made the other syntax customization properties have to be explicitly set, so making the format implicit to the current culture would make things inconsistent.
Nevermind.  Due to some other bug fixes, I've made the default format for date literals be the short date format of the current culture.  The change is in v0.9.25.0.
